display.name: The booking service providing the booking reservation.
The identifier of the booking reservation from the booking service.
The name of the service provider (e.g. Hotel) the reservation refers to
The location or place the reservation refers to (e.g. city, service provider place, etc.)
The check-in date for the reservation.
The check-out date for the reservation.
The guest of the reservation (num of adults, num of children, etc).
Indicates inclusion of car rental in the reservation.
The number of rooms the reservation refers to.
Current last name(s) or surname(s) of the holder.
Current first name(s), including middle name(s), of the holder.
Day, month, and year on which the holder was born.
